edu.uprm.ece.icom4035.mycontacts.managers

Class Contact

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uprm.ece.icom4035.mycontacts.managers.Contact
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Contact>

    public class Contact
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Contact>
    Contact is a basic data structure that stores contact details in an array and addresses in an ArrayList.

    Description

    This is an implementation of an data type which handles specific information for each instance created, provided that the array with whom it was initialized is unique (not a reference to a previously provided array).

    Notes

    Each contact can be initialized with a unique identifier using the alternative constructor. This can only be achieved when creating an instance of this class, since only getters are provided for this specific value.
    Version:
    1.5
    Author:
    Lixhjideny Méndez Ríos
